physical.title: Bicycle Race
physical.description: I want to ride my bicycle, I want to ride it where I like. (physical)

physical.title: Beautiful Girls
physical.description: Damn all these beautiful girls. They only wanna do your dirt. (physical)

digital.title: Respect
digital.description: Respect, just a little bit. Or you might walk in and find out I'm gone. (digital)

physical.title: Rubber Duckie
physical.description: Rubber Duckie, you're so fine and I'm lucky that you're mine. (physical)

digital.title: God
digital.description: God is a concept, by which we measure our pain. (digital)

physical.title: Lemon Tree
physical.description: And all that I can see is just a yellow lemon tree. (physical)

digital.title: Can't touch this
digital.description: Why you standing there man, u can't touch this. (digital)

physical.title: Umbrella
physical.description: We'll still have each other. You can stand under my umbrella. (physical)

digital.title: 99 problems
digital.description: I got ninety nine problems, but a bitch ain't one (digital)
